languages.text: {n}Идира разглядывает человека со смесью брезгливости и испуга на лице.{/n} "Я видела подобные символы. Краем глаза. Во сне. Когда варп пробирался в мои грезы и шептал о своих отравленных дарах. Не думаю, что видения этих рун пришли этим психам от их бога".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира разглядывает человека со смесью брезгливости и испуга на лице.{/n} "Я... видела подобные символы. Краем глаза. Во сне. Когда варп пробирался в мои грезы и шептал о своих отравленных дарах. Не думаю, что видения этих рун пришли этим психам от их бога шестеренок..."

languages.text: {n}Idira looks the man over with an expression of disgust and fear.{/n} "I've seen similar symbols. Caught a glimpse of them. In my dreams. Whenever the warp wormed its way into them and whispered about its virulent gifts. I doubt these lunatics were given visions of these runes by their god."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира разглядывает человека со смесью брезгливости и испуга на лице.{/n} "Я видела подобные символы. Краем глаза. Во сне. Когда варп пробирался в мои грезы и шептал о своих отравленных дарах. Не думаю, что видения этих рун пришли этим психам от их бога".

Whenever the warp wormed its way into them and whispered about its poisonous gifts. I doubt these lunatics were given the visions of these runes by their god."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉带着厌恶与恐惧的表情看着这个人。{/n}“我曾见过类似的符号，在我的梦境中瞥见过它们。每当亚空间穿过我的身体，对我低声许诺着它邪恶的礼物时，我都会看到这些符号。我怀疑这些疯子看到了幻觉，以为这些符文是他们的神明赐予他们的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks the man over with an expression of disgust and fear.{/n} "I've seen similar symbols. Caught a glimpse of them. In my dreams. Whenever the warp wormed its way into them and whispered about its virulent gifts. I doubt these lunatics were given visions of these runes by their god."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉带着厌恶与恐惧的表情看着这个人。{/n}“我曾见过类似的符号，在我的梦境中瞥见过它们。每当亚空间穿过我的身体，对我低声许诺着它邪恶的礼物时，我都会看到这些符号。我怀疑这些疯子看到了幻觉，以为这些符文是他们的神明赐予他们的。”

languages.text: {n}Idira mira al hombre con una mezcla de asco y miedo.{/n} «He visto símbolos similares. Momentáneamente durante mis sueños. Cuando la disformidad logra entrar en ellos para ofrecerme sus virulentos dones. Dudo mucho que quien haya mostrado estas runas a estos lunáticos fuera su dios».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks the man over with an expression of disgust and fear.{/n} "I've seen similar symbols. Caught a glimpse of them. In my dreams. Whenever the warp wormed its way into them and whispered about its virulent gifts. I doubt these lunatics were given visions of these runes by their god."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira mira al hombre con una mezcla de asco y miedo.{/n} «He visto símbolos similares. Momentáneamente durante mis sueños. Cuando la disformidad logra entrar en ellos para ofrecerme sus virulentos dones. Dudo mucho que quien haya mostrado estas runas a estos lunáticos fuera su dios».

languages.text: {n}イディラは、嫌悪と恐怖を滲ませた表情でその男を見る。{/n}「似たようなシンボルを見た覚えがあるわ。チラッとだけ、夢の中でね。歪みが夢の中に入り込んで、その毒々しい贈り物のことを囁くときにいつも見るのよ。この可哀想な人達が、神にルーンのビジョンを授けられたとは思えないわね」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks the man over with an expression of disgust and fear.{/n} "I've seen similar symbols. Caught a glimpse of them. In my dreams. Whenever the warp wormed its way into them and whispered about its virulent gifts. I doubt these lunatics were given visions of these runes by their god."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは、嫌悪と恐怖を滲ませた表情でその男を見る。{/n}「似たようなシンボルを見た覚えがあるわ。チラッとだけ、夢の中でね。歪みが夢の中に入り込んで、その毒々しい贈り物のことを囁くときにいつも見るのよ。この可哀想な人達が、神にルーンのビジョンを授けられたとは思えないわね」

languages.text: {n}Idira mustert den Mann mit einer Mischung aus Abscheu und Furcht.{/n} "Ich habe ähnliche Symbole schon gesehen. Habe eine kurzen Blick darauf geworfen. In meinen Träumen. Immer wenn der Warp sich in sie eingeschlichen und von seinen virulenten Geschenken geflüstert hat. Ich bezweifle, dass diese Wahnsinnigen die Visionen dieser Runen von ihrem Gott erhalten haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks the man over with an expression of disgust and fear.{/n} "I've seen similar symbols. Caught a glimpse of them. In my dreams. Whenever the warp wormed its way into them and whispered about its virulent gifts. I doubt these lunatics were given visions of these runes by their god."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira mustert den Mann mit einer Mischung aus Abscheu und Furcht.{/n} "Ich habe ähnliche Symbole schon gesehen. Habe eine kurzen Blick darauf geworfen. In meinen Träumen. Immer wenn der Warp sich in sie eingeschlichen und von seinen virulenten Geschenken geflüstert hat. Ich bezweifle, dass diese Wahnsinnigen die Visionen dieser Runen von ihrem Gott erhalten haben."

languages.text: {n}Idira observe l'homme avec une expression de dégoût mâtiné de crainte.{/n} « Ce n'est pas la première fois que je vois ce genre de symboles. Je les ai entraperçus en rêve. Tous étaient corrompus par le Warp, qui s'en servait pour propager ses fausses promesses de grandeur. Je doute fort que ces malades tiennent ces runes de leur dieu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks the man over with an expression of disgust and fear.{/n} "I've seen similar symbols. Caught a glimpse of them. In my dreams. Whenever the warp wormed its way into them and whispered about its virulent gifts. I doubt these lunatics were given visions of these runes by their god."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira observe l'homme avec une expression de dégoût mâtiné de crainte.{/n} « Ce n'est pas la première fois que je vois ce genre de symboles. Je les ai entraperçus en rêve. Tous étaient corrompus par le Warp, qui s'en servait pour propager ses fausses promesses de grandeur. Je doute fort que ces malades tiennent ces runes de leur dieu. »

languages.text: {n}İdira, yüzüne hem iğrenme hem de korku ifadesi kazınmış bir şekilde adama bakıyor.{/n} "Daha önce benzer semboller görmüştüm. Öteboyut, tüm sinsiliğiyle bu divanelerin benliklerine işler ve zehirli hediyelerini kulaklarına fısıldar. Sonrasında düşlerimde gözüme ilişirler. Tanrılarının bu aklı yitiklere rünlerin görülerini bahşettiğini hiç sanmam."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks the man over with an expression of disgust and fear.{/n} "I've seen similar symbols. Caught a glimpse of them. In my dreams. Whenever the warp wormed its way into them and whispered about its virulent gifts. I doubt these lunatics were given visions of these runes by their god."

Öteboyut, tüm sinsiliğiyle bu divanelerin benliklerine işler ve zehirli hediyelerini kulaklarına fısıldar. Sonrasında düşlerimde gözüme ilişirler.
